Html: Hello.  I'd like to know if there are any plans to update Rawr in the near future.  It is in need of a new item database (Season 4, ect.), as well as a couple error fixes.  I'd love to see a new version of this come out, as I use it to compare every piece of raid gear I have (8/8 T6, ect.).   Please let me know if anyone has heard about this.
...What? You can add all the gear you want to it, already. We're working on a new release, yes, but you're not waiting on it to get the items you want. See the readme if you have trouble.
